Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Rosepine
Ward 3 Wardwide School Dist. No. 160 -- 18.77 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward Three Wardwide School District No. 160 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Ward Three Wardwide School District No. 160 of Vernon Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of eighteen and seventy-seven hundredths (18.77) mills on all of the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $241,644 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public elementary and secondary schools in the District, including paying the cost of operating and maintaining public school houses and buildings in the District, said millage to represent a five and sixty-three hundredths mills (5.63) increase over the 13.14 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on April 29, 2006?

Race.SpecificTitle: Ward 7 Wardwide School District -- 17.42 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward Seven Wardwide School District Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Ward Seven Wardwide School District of Vernon Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a seventeen and forty-two hundredths (17.42) mills tax on all of the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $315,735 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public elementary and secondary schools in the District, including paying the cost of operating and maintaining public school houses and buildings in the District, said millage to represent a four and forty-two hundredths mills (4.42) increase over the 13 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on April 29, 2006?
